name: Retrieve Stolen Necklace
description: Find and return the stolen necklace to the jeweler.

name: Deliver Secret Document
description: Deliver the secret document to the agent at the safe house.

name: Rescue the Cat
description: Find and rescue the cat stuck in the old warehouse and bring it back to its owner.

name: Collect Rare Herb
description: Collect the rare herb from the forest and deliver it to the herbalist.

name: Recover Lost Ring
description: Find the lost ring in the park and return it to the owner.
